title: 50 g superglue extra strong - incl. anti-drying tip - KRAFTPROTZ - thin liquid superglue - universally usable for gluing plastic, glass, wood, stone, metal
availability_text: Only 10 left in stock (more on the way).
features: ARKA KRAFTPROTZ superglue – Our superglue is a real all-rounder for all bonding processes that require fast and strong connections. Its material compatibility, high performance and easy application make it the ideal choice for gluing plastics, textiles, arts and crafts, glass, leather, wood, stone and much more.

FAST & EFFECTIVE: The superglue is fast-drying, heat-resistant, weather-resistant, waterproof and adheres to many different surfaces. Thanks to its unique properties, our instant glue can be used to create strong bonds very quickly.

UNIVERSAL: This all-purpose adhesive is ideal for gluing metals, plastic, wood, glass, fabrics, leather, rubber and much more. The perfect partner for every household, workshop, construction site and DIY project.

USER-FRIENDLY: Since the adhesive is a single component, no mixing is necessary for the application. After application, the adhesive cures quickly at room temperature. Thanks to the special lid, the dosing tip of our superglue is prevented from sticking.
ARKA BIOTECHNOLOGIE GMBH - specialises in the development, production and worldwide distribution of innovative products for aquaristics, DIY and accessories for dogs, cats and rodents.
description: ARKA Kraftprotz is a universally applicable, extra strong superglue with a thin consistency. It is ideal for bonding metals, plastics, wood, glass and much more.
